Text:
This was a request by somone on another of my torrents, to that person: Unfortunately I couldn't get Panzer General or Battle Isle. I assure you, if a game isn't working to my usual standards I try for at least an entire hour to get that game working. If it does not then I appologise for being unable to upload it.

On an unrelated note: ONCE YOU DOWNLOAD, PLEASE SEED TO KEEP THESE CLASSIC GAMES ALIVE!
THANKE YOU! THANKE YOU!!! And THAAANKEEE YOOOUUUU!!!!!! Man NO.1: CF!!! :p
